main_definition: Dayton is primarily known as the name of a city in Ohio, USA, but it can also refer to other meanings such as an idiomatic expression related to peace or negotiation.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A city in Ohio, United States
meanings_and_examples.example: Dayton is the birthplace of aviation pioneer Wilbur Wright.

meanings_and_examples.definition: An idiomatic expression related to peace or negotiation
meanings_and_examples.example: The Dayton Agreement brought an end to the Bosnian War, resulting in a lasting peace agreement.
